titleStmt.title: SII 7.1046: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1046. (A.R. No. 413 of 1902). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE MANDAPA IN FRONT OF THE SIVA TEMPLE AT KULAMBANDAL CHEYYAR TALUK, NORTH ARCOT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
tiṅkaḷertaru taṉṟoṅkal veṇkuṭai kiḻ nilamakaḷ nilava malarmakaḷ puṇarn=tu ceṅko locci karuṅkali kaṭin=tu tantaiyar tamaiyaṉ tampiyar tan=tirumaintareṉṟivarai maṇimuṭi cūṭṭik kaṉni kāvalar teṉṉavar muvarunḷvāṉaka miruvark karuḷik kāṉakam Oruvaṉuk kaḷittup porucilaic ceralaṉ velaikeḻu kān=taḷurccālai kalamaṟuppittu Ilaṅkaiyaṟ karaicaiyum Alaṅkal vallapaṉaiyuṅ kaṉnakucciyar kāvalaṉaiyum
ponṉaṇi muṭittalai taṭin=tu taṉ koṭippaṭai Evik kaṉnāṭakar viṭu karipuraḷat tanṉāṭaiyiṟ tamiṭparaṇi koṇ ṭoṉṉār vañccira neṭuvāḷ viccayaṉ veruvi neḷit tañciyoṭat taṉ vañciyampaṭaiyāl Āṅkavaṉ pitāvai mātāvoṭu catāmaliviṅku taṉ viram pūṇṭura veñcamat taṭalervāraṇavaraicaik kaṭalpuraic ciṟutuṟai perun=tuṟait teyvavimarasiyeṉ ṟuṟutuṟai muṉṟilum Oḷirpuṉa lūṭṭivit tāṅkavar rettak kiriyil Ōṅkiya luḻuvaiye
ṟeḻuti Uyarjayastampam Eḻilpeṟa niṟuttit taṉkaḻal paṇintoḻukum Araicarkaḷoṭu ceṇṭāṭip porupuli virakkoṭi yeṭut toṉṉalar kavarnta tuṉnetip piṟakkam Iravalarāṉork kiyn=tu viravalla maṟṟavar varaviṭu moṟṟaraip piṭippit tāṅkavar mārvil Ākavamallaṉ yāṅṅaṉam Añcinaneṉna naṉkeḻutic celuttiyappiṉṉait taṉ pulippaṭai Evi Avaṉ viṭu taṇṭuttukkavaṉ vilpuravi
nuḷampaṉuṅ kāḷitāsaṉum viḷamperun=tārc cāmuṇṭaṉum poṟkommayaṉum villavarājaṉu mutalinar velcamat tiriya Āṅkavar peruneti kavarn=tu kūṟṟaraṉuppaḷaṉ kommalarp pacun=talai tarāttayilp paṉtaṭin=tu munkoṇṭu takaivanta paḻai muṉṟai Appakai cekut tuppaḷaṉvaḻiyiṟ ṟappiya varaicar Āṅkatu mikkamāṭṭātu taṉ pūṅkaḻal caraṇeṉap pukun=ta varaṇavirkkaḷitta
taṭimuṭik kiṭaṅkuṭut tirun=ta taṭaṅkavaṉa tappaiyaip paṟittuṭaṉkoṇṭu potuṟai puṉa liraṭṭapāṭi yerimaṭut tavviraṭṭa meḻaṟaiyilakkamum matimuṉ ṉāṇṭu viśvalokattu viḷaṅku maṉuneṟi niṉṟaśvametañ cey taraicu vīṟṟirun=ta jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻaṉuyarn=ta perumpukaḻ kovirājakesaripanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīrājādhirājadevaṟku yāṇṭu muppa
ttumuṉṟāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kāliyūṟkoṭṭattup pākūrṉāṭṭu nakaram vikkiramacoḻapurattuk kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻaĪśvaramuṭaiyāṟku Uṭaiyār śrīrājādhirājadevar gurudevar Atikārikaḷ pārācaryan vāsudevanārāyaṇaṉāna Ulakaḷan=tacoḻa brahmārāyaṉ vaitta tirunun=tāviḷakku Oṉṟukkuc cāvā muvāp pe
rāṭu toṇṇūṟu man=tikkāppukkup poṉ Aiṅkaḻañcum Ittevar tiruvuṇāḻikaiUṭaiya civabrāhmaṇan kauśikaṉ mallapaṭṭaṉum kauśikaṉ cūriyatevaṉum kauśikaṉ paṭṭālakaṉum bhāratvāśi can=tiracekaraṉum Iṉṉālvom Ivvāṭum Ippoḷaṉum kaikkoṇṭu Ivvāṭu toṇṇū
Arumoḻitevaṉāl nicata muḻakku neyyum Ippoṉṉukku van=ta palicaiyāl tiruvan=ti kkāppukku nicatam Iruceviṭarai yeṇṇaiyu maṭṭi Ittiruviḷakkum Ittiruvan=ti kkāppum candrādittavaṟ celuttakkaṭavomāṉom Ikkoyilil kāṇiyuṭaiya śivabrāhmaṇarom Ivarkaḷ colla Eḻuti
śivabrāhaṇaṉ kaucikaṉ kaṇavatipaṭṭaneṉ Ivai Eṉ Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.1046 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
